changelog: Added detailed configuration and installation documentation in README.md and Flash Docs
Added owner tags for vehicle listings to identify personal listings
Added support for separate markets with unique configurations
Added multi-location support for market NPCs, each with unique jobs, vehicles, and commands
Changed: Optimized SQL queries for improved performance
Changed: Refactored blacklisted vehicles initialization to be market-specific
Changed: Improved market configuration for multiple independent markets
Changed: Expanded NPC location configuration for multiple market points
Fixed UI notification display and formatting issues, improved notification system
Fixed framework initialization issues in QBCore and QBox support
